divs: Sighting Details well we where sitting in front tv room looking out windo when we seen a bright lihgt growing with intencety as it moved around thin it whent super bright almost blinding we went out frount and object started rapidly changing directions as it was discharging what looked multen medal fire dpops first one then two then many droped from one side of craft well i say craft cause you could see its shaps it looked nothing ide ever seen when we first noticed it it was the brightest star we ever seen so we went to see if it was a commet NO IT WAS NOT it was a for sure a ufo we watched it for over long perid of time long anuff to walk across street to get our freinds and show them they wehre as shocked as we where
Summary: acorn shape with a fire color on underside and droping small fire balls to one side
